name: Ballmer Helps Baldi (1st Prize Helps Baldi Mod)
name_original: Ballmer Helps Baldi (1st Prize Helps Baldi Mod)
description:
Ballmer Helps Baldi (1st Prize Helps Baldi Mod) is a game developed by SuperGumballDorian. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Ballmer Helps Baldi (1st Prize Helps Baldi Mod) on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
